option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -R $PROJECT_DIR$ -f {root}/src/azure/inputs.list -f dbapi=lowercase -o {root}/out/azure/sql/ddl/mssql ddl.MSSqlDDL -o {root}/out/azure/sql/py/dbapi code.PyDBOldCode -o {root}/out/azure/sql/py/dbapi/mssql code.MSSqlPyCode -o {root}/out/azure/sql/py/dbapi/odbc code.OdbcPyCode -o {root}/out/azure/sql/msssh code.MSSqlCCode
